name: Trollge
description: Zdrogo Studio is a small developer team, we are beginners. The team consists of 3 people but only 1 made the game (me). Trollge can only see, he moves around the map. He can see your flashlight. Survive the Trollge and escape. To do that find the oil......Coop mode is buggy because (i dont know how to do it) and it supposed to be singleplayer only. Have fun and dont get trolled.
